text: Gumazir aruam, Tiofilus, nɨ fo, gumazamizir avɨriba God en tongɨn amizir bizibar ganigha, dar gun osirasava ami. E uari uan damazibar ganizir gumazamizibar akam baraki. Me faragha Godɨn akamɨn ingangarir gumazamizibar otivigha, an akam akuri. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, kɨ uaghan akar kam osirigh nɨ bagh anemangasa. Egha kɨ deraghavɨra dar mɨngaribagh foghasa ingara ghua dagh foghava, nɨ bagha bar deravɨrama da osiri. Nɨ dar gan fogh suam, bizir nɨ oraghizir kaba da guizɨn biziba.
